Text:
Not only is Counterstrike for losers, but cheating is for losers.  Clearly a case where two wrongs do not make a right.

Use your abilities at coding to do something more useful.

Counterstrike isn't for losers... Its just that too many people plays computer games too much that other people thinks that these kind of games creates losers, but there are far more than just gaming... I think :P Anyways, thanks, I think it helped... Or maybe I just... Umm... Got worst in tactical reloading...
